'''Kate Dickie''' (born 1971) is a Scottish actress. She recently appeared in Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller ''Prometheus'', as well as the drama series ''[[wikipedia:Five Daughters|Five Daughters]]'' and ''[[wikipedia:Pillars of the Earth|Pillars of the Earth]]''. She won a Scottish BAFTA for her role in ''[[wikipedia:Red Road (film)|Red Road]]''. In [[wikipedia:Ridley Scott|Ridley Scott]]'s film ''[[wikipedia:Prometheus (film)|Prometheus]]'', she plays the role of Ford, the ship's medic.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'', she plays the role of [[Lysa Arryn]]. She was announced in the role on 16 July 2010. She appeared in several episodes of the [[Season 1|first season]]. It was reported that she filmed a scene for the [[Mhysa|final episode]] of [[Season 3]], but this scene was cut from the final episode. Her agent later confirmed that she would return for the [[Season 4|fourth season]].<ref>[http://winteriscoming.net/2013/06/slynt-lysa-and-rorge-set-to-return-for-s4/ Winter is Coming]</ref> She reprised the role for two episodes of the fourth season, before her character's demise.
